"What can I do to help you Rowdy? I still care for you as a friend."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> "I was the only one left in the cave when you took Quickstrike from 
> them. I fought the Vok drone so you could escape. Their choosen one 
> was taken, and I was the next best thing, but not what they had in 
> mind." He looked at his left arm that had the external parts of a 
> canon on it.
